items.title: IREDA confident of recovery from Gensol EV assets, provisioning may not rise
items.description: IREDA was the first lender to file for insolvency against Gensol and has since seen an interim resolution professional (IRP) appointed. A meeting of the committee of creditors (CoC) was held last week and a resolution professional (RP) is expected to be confirmed this month.

items.title: Eternal Q1 FY26: Scaling up fast, but can it deliver margin consistency?
items.description: While the transition to an inventory-led model and continued store expansion could drive long-term margin expansion, execution risks remain elevated

items.title: Govt plans battery storage for thermal power plants amid renewable energy fluctuations
items.description: Operating thermal power plants at low capacity to allow higher injection of renewable energy into the grid during the day is expensive and leads to higher per unit cost of coal-fired electricity
